pageContext.claim: “When you have 20 people killed, 22 people killed in one weekend in Chicago, and you have 88 shootings -- it's not even conceivable. That's worse than Afghanistan. I hate to say it: That's worse than any war zone that we're in, by a lot. It makes them look like tame places by comparison.”
pageContext.analysis: Comparing Afghanistan's murder rate with those of U.S. cities tells you nothing about crime or public safety -- because Afghanistan has been a warzone for many years.
